pfDatepicker
directive in module patternfly.form

Description

Angular directive to wrap the bootstrap datepicker http://bootstrap-datepicker.readthedocs.org/en/latest/

Usage

as attribute
<ANY pf-datepicker
     date="{string}"
     options="{string}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
datestring

the date model

optionsstring

the configuration options for the date picker
